content: Is there a reason no one on the API site has the 'View hidden paths' permission? Was it an oversight, or on purpose?
I've given that permission to Developers, just so I can see hidden nodes after I create them.

That permission was added as part of #100, with https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop/pull/2286 ...that change included only a single update hook, and it was not about giving that permission to roles on existing sites.
